name: Blind Jimbo
description:
Blind Jimbo:

Control Jimbo, Bub, and Tipp. Help them find the Trophy they are looking for!

Use the characters to solve puzzles by pushing boxes around.

Controls:

  • Mouse Click to Select or Deselect Characters
  • WSAD to move.
  • Space to Lift or Throw.

Submitted to the Brackeys Game Jam 2

Change Log:

Added a few sounds, post-processing, and a Windows build during the rating phase.
